cs.man.ac.uk.data

Interface I_Instance

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Instance

    public interface I_Instance
    The interface defining the methods for a standard data instance.
    Author:
    Rob Lyon

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getClassLabel

        int getClassLabel()
        Returns:
        the class label of the instance, -2 is returned if the true class label is unknown.

      • getFeature

        double getFeature(int f)
        Parameters:
        f - the index of the feature
        Returns:
        the feature at the specified index, otherwise NaN is returned if no such feature exists.

      • getFeatures

        java.util.Vector<java.lang.Double> getFeatures()
        Returns:
        all features that describe this instance (does not include class label), else an empty double [] is returned.

      • setClasslabel

        void setClasslabel(int i)
        Sets the class label.
        Parameters:
        i - the new class label.

      • setFeature

        boolean setFeature(int f,
                   double value)
        Sets the value of the feature at the specified index.
        Parameters:
        f - the feature index.
        value - the value for the feature.
        Returns:
        true if the feature is set, else false.

      • setFeatures

        boolean setFeatures(double[] values)
        Sets the values of all features.
        Parameters:
        values - the values for the features.
        Returns:
        true if the feature is set, else false.

      • addFeature

        void addFeature(double f)
        Adds a new feature to this instance.
        Parameters:
        f - the feature value.

      • removeFeature

        void removeFeature(int f)
        Removes the feature at the specified index.
        Parameters:
        f - the feature index.

      • getFeatureCount

        int getFeatureCount()
        Returns:
        a count of the features possessed by the instance.

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the instance as a string.

      • weight

        double weight()
        Returns:
        the training weight of this instance.

      • classIsMissing

        boolean classIsMissing()
        Returns:
        if the class label for this instance is missing or unknown.

      • isMissing

        boolean isMissing(int index)
        Tests if a specific value attribute value is missing.
        Parameters:
        index - the attribute index to check
        Returns:
        true if the attribute is missing else false.

      • numAttributes

        int numAttributes()
        Returns:
        a count of the number of attributes possessed by this instance.

      • classValue

        double classValue()
        Returns:
        the value of the class label of this instance, as a double value.

      • value

        double value(int index)
        Gets the value of the attribute at the specified index.
        Parameters:
        index - the attribute to return the value for.
        Returns:
        the attribute value as a double.
